author: Staff Reporter
text:
B. Sakthi (19), a third year engineering student in Coimbatore, has entered Guinness Book of Records for the second time, for most number of backward body skips (with both hands tied together with a rope) in 30 seconds.

He made record attempts for the most number of backward body skips in 60 seconds and 30 seconds, respectively, at Brookefields Mall on October 18 last year.

Approval

He got the earlier record for the 60 seconds fete approved in December as he had applied for it under the fast review.

Last week, he got the second record attempt also approved.
title: Student sets another world record
